content.html: I once met a man on a train in Serbia who was trying to travel to every single country, and the minimum definition was one sleep and one beer. I’ve got about 50 done (35 entirely by bike) and now I can finally tick off Vatican City. I wasn’t expecting to find a beer, but I did!
content.value:
I once met a man on a train in Serbia who was trying to travel to every single country, and the minimum definition was one sleep and one beer.

I’ve got about 50 done (35 entirely by bike) and now I can finally tick off Vatican City. I wasn’t expecting to find a beer, but I did!
